summary: Completed comprehensive testing of audio transcription app. Backend APIs working well (83% success rate), frontend UI functional with one critical clipboard permission issue affecting copy functionality.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns 500 for minimal audio files shorter than 0.1 seconds

integration_issues.issue: Back button navigation from transcription to landing page fails
Dropdown overlay prevents clicking options - HTML element intercepts pointer events

passed_tests: Landing page loads with all components
Upload and record buttons present and clickable
History item click loads transcription text
success_percentage: Backend: 83% (5/6 tests passed), Frontend: 75% (9/12 features working)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard permission error for copy functionality - implement fallback copy method or handle permissions properly. Fix back button navigation routing. Address language dropdown overlay issue preventing option selection.
